      • controlCloze

        public float controlCloze(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> _answers)
        Returns the result in percentage based on the given answers. If the size of the given answers is not equal to the correct answers it returns the invalid value -1.
        Parameters:
        _answers - Array of strings which is compared with the correct answers
        Returns:
        Result represented by a float value

      • removeQuestionAndAnswer

        public boolean removeQuestionAndAnswer(int _index)
        Returns true or false, depending on whether the question and corresponding answer were removed successful. In case the given index is out of bounds it returns false.
        Parameters:
        _index - integer which specifies the question/answer to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if questions/answer are removed successful, else false
